text: (napiye!) Atamutaiya iru kumararkalin unmai varalarrai nir avarkalukku otikkanpiyum;. Avviruvarum (opvoruvarum) kurpani kotutta potu, oruvaritamiruntu atu erruk kollappattatu. Marravaritamiruntu atu errukkollappatavillai. (Pinnavar)"nan niccayamaka unnaik kolai ceytu vituven" enru kurinar. Atarku (munnavar)"meyyakave allah erruk kolvatu payapaktiyutaiyavarkalitamiruntu tan" enru kurinar
